newsitem.title: USA: Cablevision to sell Illinois cable system.
newsitem.headline: Cablevision to sell Illinois cable system.

text.p: Cablevision Systems Corp said Thursday that it has a definitive agreement to sell its Rockford, Ill., cable television system to Insight Communications for about $97 million in cash.

"Cablevision has made a commitment to concentrate our resources on our core geographic clusters -- New York metro, the Boston-area and Ohio," James Dolan, chief executive officer said in a press release.
Cablevision of Rockford currently serves approximately 65,000 cable customers in Illinois.
